title: New Heavens, New Earth
itunes:title: New Heavens, New Earth
description: Throughout the Easter season, we’ve had the privilege of reading from the book of Revelation, the final book of the Bible, the place where the entire Scriptural revelation comes to its climax. Our passage for this Sunday is taken from the 21st chapter, the penultimate chapter of the book.  Hence, it is, if you will, the ringing finale of the entire Bible, the terminus ad quem of all of Scripture.
